title: Embiggen: The Embiggening
blurb: Utilizing scaling to traverse large game maps while growing and shrinking items to interact with environment.
content_html:
Inspiration

What began as detestation for teleportation as a lazy means of travel embiggenned into something more. By introducing the scale mechanic, we aim to engender in the player a deeper appreciation for his or her surroundings. We allow the player to move about the environment natrually. We beleive that expanding upon the preexisting human experience is the best way to interact with the virtual world. This retains comfort while allowing the user to experience the amazing.

What it does

Allows you to traverse long distance by walking instead of teleporting. Also allows the user to either grow or shrink their character and found items to problem solve and find alternative and creative use cases as they progress through the world.

How we built it

With unity, the vive, and a little bit of luck.
